---
title: "Publications"
format: html
---

```{r}
#| echo: false
#| message: FALSE
#| warning: FALSE
#| results: asis

pubs <- read.csv("publications.csv")

for(i in 1:nrow(pubs)) {
  cat('##', pubs$title[i],'\n')
  cat(pubs$author[i], '<br/>')
  cat('*',pubs$journal[i],'*<br/>', sep = "")
  cat(paste0('[Link to article](',pubs$url[i],'){target="_blank"}', sep = ""))
  cat('<details><summary>Click for abstract</summary>',pubs$abstract[i],'</details>')
}
```
